item.title: Double exp for donors?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

oh thanks, im trying to develop it, i think im making progress, but how would it look? im using delta:

original:

double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double) (500 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double) (1250 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double) (1250 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

and my new code:

[code]double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double) (500 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double) (1250 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double) (1250 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

				else if (donator >= 1)
				if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
					TotalExp = (double) (1000 * hitDiff);
					TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
				} else if (FightType != 3) {
					TotalExp = (double) (2500 * hitDiff);
					TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
				} else {
					TotalExp = (double) (2500 * hitDiff);
					TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
					addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
					addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
				}[/code]

can someone tell me were i am missing the brackets? i cant really tell were it is because im getting 100 errors

Read full topic
